title: TMCs and Corporates to witness 247 TravelDesk at ITandCMA 2015, Bangkok
text:
Monday 21st September 2015 TMCs and Corporates to witness 247 TravelDesk at IT&CMA 2015, Bangkok 
247 TravelDesk is an advanced travel management tool from Mystifly exclusively for corporates and TMCs that enables employees to self-book and manage complex, multi-segment itineraries. Mystifly's presence at Stand No: D12 at IT&CMA 2015 will enhance the capability of Corporates & TMCs to not only meet their ticketing fulfillment needs, but also control travel mismanagement and wastage. Harish Chandran, Associate Vice President - Sales, Mystifly says " With 247 TravelDesk travel managers can restrict travel to particular airlines, ticket types, prices, classes or routes. Where users book higher value travel or surpass company policy, they can be obliged to provide a 'break policy explanation'. Also multiple levels of approvals can be assigned before a travel request is approved " The platform allows the traveller to create a super PNR where-in the flight, hotel and car reservation can be merged into one PNR. Also this tool can be downloaded in the form of Mobile App and used by the user on the go to track and approve travel itineraries. Book an appointment today to get a live demo of this technology at IT&CMA from 30th Sep - 1st Oct 2015 at Booth No. D12 247 TravelDesk is an offering from Mystifly. Nominated as the World's Leading Airline Consolidator by World Travel Awards, Mystifly offers best airfare deals on over 900 airlines across 70+ Countries on a single platform, making it the preferred choice of over 6000 travel professionals across 60+ Countries.
